org.gearvrf

Class GVRShadowMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRComponent
        • org.gearvrf.GVRBehavior
          • org.gearvrf.GVRRenderTarget
            • org.gearvrf.GVRShadowMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GVRDrawFrameListener

    public class GVRShadowMap
extends GVRRenderTarget
    Causes a shadow map to be rendered from the viewpoint of the scene object which owns the shadow map. A shadow map is only rendered if a light is attached to the owning scene object. All of the shadow maps are kept in a single texture array and they must all be the same size. This array is created the first time a GVRShadowMap component is created.
    See Also:
    GVRRenderTarget, GVRRenderTextureArray

    • Method Detail

      • addOrthoShadowCamera

        public void addOrthoShadowCamera(GVRPerspectiveCamera centerCam)
        Adds an orthographic camera constructed from the designated perspective camera to describe the shadow projection. The field of view and aspect ration of the perspective camera are used to obtain the view volume of the orthographic camera. This type of camera is used for shadows generated by direct lights at infinite distance.
        Parameters:
        centerCam - GVRPerspectiveCamera to derive shadow projection from
        See Also:
        GVRDirectLight

      • addPerspShadowCamera

        public void addPerspShadowCamera(GVRPerspectiveCamera centerCam,
                                 float coneAngle)
        Adds a perspective camera constructed from the designated perspective camera to describe the shadow projection. This type of camera is used for shadows generated by spot lights.
        Parameters:
        centerCam - GVRPerspectiveCamera to derive shadow projection from
        coneAngle - spot light cone angle
        See Also:
        GVRSpotLight

      • setPerspShadowMatrix

        public void setPerspShadowMatrix(org.joml.Matrix4f modelView,
                                 GVRLightBase light)
        Sets the shadow matrix for the spot light from the input model/view matrix and the shadow camera projection matrix.
        Parameters:
        modelView - light model/view transform
        light - spot light component to update

      • setOrthoShadowMatrix

        public void setOrthoShadowMatrix(org.joml.Matrix4f modelView,
                                 GVRLightBase light)
        Sets the direct light shadow matrix for the light from the input model/view matrix and the shadow camera projection matrix.
        Parameters:
        modelView - light model/view transform
        light - direct light component to update
